name: Arabian Horse
description: Known for its refined features, endurance, and intelligence, the Arabian is one of the oldest and most recognizable horse breeds.

name: Clydesdale
description: A large, powerful draft horse with distinctive feathered legs, often associated with pulling heavy loads and the Budweiser commercials.

name: Appaloosa
description: Famous for its unique spotted coat patterns and versatility, the Appaloosa is a popular choice for both Western and English riding.

name: Friesian
description: An elegant black horse with long flowing mane and tail, the Friesian is known for its graceful movement and strong build.

name: American Quarter Horse
description: A versatile breed known for its speed in short-distance racing and prowess in ranch work and Western sports.
